topics.body:
WOOHOO!  The patriot act expired!
!http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/928/594/f78.gif!


Obviously they're going to eventually pass another bill that does a similar thing, but considering the amount of opposition to the patriot act in the senate and the house it will be considerably harder to pass it as is; even if they do pass another spying bill chances are the bulk spying on people is probably going to be significantly smaller and only with warrants.

Tl:dr; warrantless spying on usa citizens at least for now is illegal and if they do pass another bill the bulk spying will probably be thrown out.


For now we'll have to wait and see how this goes though, but for now they can't spy on people without a warrant.

topics.body:
Lucky Star ep21 impressions

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]lol i only spent $30 at the most recent convention i went to, i only bought one thing too XD 

heat stroke, i can relate, i got it today XD 

BEER 

no matter how early you go to bed, you will almost always wake up at your regular hour regardless of how much sleep you get. 

TSUKASA STOP BEING ME 

*gets great idea, forgets what it was after 20 seconds because i didn't write it down* 

*gets great idea while about to fall asleep* NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO 

i barely remember my dreams anymore >_> 

DEER 

what the heck was up with that chasing the bus scene 

Kagami got a love letter or something...? 

Ruby and Sapphire are best Pokemon games... that's relevant right? 

...people are weird 

daww friend things or something 

so what happened with Nanako's computer? internet downtime? 

who is this guest 

JEEZ MINORU WHAT EVEN HAPPENED TO YOU 

*sniff sniff* 

Akira you freaking suck XD 

MINORU'S RAGE BROKE... WE'RE ALL DOOMED 

hooooooly crap that scene was amazing XD 

"WELCOME TO IDAAAHOOOOO" 

the sky is a green screen[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

yep this episode's probably my favorite so far
